Title: Method-Level Bug Prediction
Elements_risk_assessment:
Whenever we find that a method was changed between two revisions of a file  and the commit mes-
sage contains a bug reference, we consider the method to be affected by the bug
Summary:
present bug prediction models at the level of individual methods
rather than at file-level.
Outcome:
prediction models reach a precision and recall of 84% and 88%, respectively. Furthermore, the
results indicate that change metrics significantly outperform
source code metrics.
